annotation.scene_description: Two distinct warm signatures visible, one in the top-right and another larger one in the bottom-left with high contrast against cooler surroundings.

anomalies.notable_features: Small, irregularly shaped thermal signature with moderate contrast against the background
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Shape and size could correspond to small debris or an animal resting

anomalies.notable_features: Large, vertically-oriented thermal signature with strong contrast, resembling a crouched person or animal
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: The thermal intensity and orientation suggest the presence of a stationary person or large animal
